operation.name: checkPermissions
operation.documentation: Check wether a user has the right to use the service. Returns true on success.

operation.name: checkmultiPermissions
operation.documentation: Check whether a list of users have the right to use the service. Returns a list of userids with permission.

operation.name: checkcommunitypermissions
operation.documentation: Check wether a community has the right to use the service. Returns true on success.

operation.name: getsoapservicerelease
operation.documentation: Get release number

operation.name: getuserid
operation.documentation: Get the ID of a user for the user name (login)

operation.name: getlogin
operation.documentation: Get the login of a user by the user ID

operation.name: getUserInformation
operation.documentation: Get user Informations by the user ID (Only registered IPs and activated IPs for this function)

operation.name: getusersfirstname
operation.documentation: Get the first name of a user by the user ID

operation.name: getusersname
operation.documentation: Get the first and last name of a user by the user ID

operation.name: getuserspoints
operation.documentation: Get the current points of a user

operation.name: getmultiuserspoints
operation.documentation: Get the current points of users

operation.name: getusersgamdaybudgetstate
operation.documentation: state shows if the user receives points or not (true or false)

operation.name: getmultiusersgamdaybudgetstate
operation.documentation: state shows if the users receives points or not (true or false)

operation.name: getusersdescription
operation.documentation: Get the description of a user

operation.name: getteamvalue
operation.documentation: Get the total value of a user's team

operation.name: getteamsize
operation.documentation: Get the total number of players in a user's team

operation.name: getcommunityid
operation.documentation: Get the ID of a community from a user ID

operation.name: getcommunityname
operation.documentation: Get the name of a community from a community ID

operation.name: getcommunitynamebyuserid
operation.documentation: Get the name of a community from a user ID

operation.name: getuserlogins
operation.documentation: Get all logins of active or blocked members of a community from the community ID

operation.name: getuserids
operation.documentation: Get all user ids of active or blocked members of a community from the community ID

operation.name: getgamedays
operation.documentation: Get all gamdays of the current season

operation.name: getcommunityadmins
operation.documentation: Get all community admin ids of active members of a community from the community ID

operation.name: getcommunitymarket
operation.documentation: Get all player from exchangemarket of a community (only registered IPs)

operation.name: player_getcommunitymarket
operation.documentation: Get all player from exchangemarket of the own community (only registered PRO-Player)

operation.name: getplayerbyid
operation.documentation: Get a player by id

operation.name: getusergamedaypoints
operation.documentation: Get the points of a registered user at a gameday, e.g. "1","2","3"

operation.name: getusergamedaypointsid
operation.documentation: Get the points of a registered user at a gameday by gameday_id

operation.name: getmultiusergamedaypoints
operation.documentation: Get the points by gameday of some players (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getmultiusergamedaypointsid
operation.documentation: Get the points by gameday_id of some players (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getlatestgameday
operation.documentation: Get the ID of the lastest game day

operation.name: getlatestgamedayid
operation.documentation: Get gamday_id of the lastest gameday

operation.name: getcomputernews
operation.documentation: Get the news of the computer the last x days and y items at most

operation.name: communityexists
operation.documentation: Check if a community exists

operation.name: getclubs
operation.documentation: Get the clubs available

operation.name: getplayersbyclubid
operation.documentation: Get the players of a club

operation.name: getplayersbyclubidinclretired
operation.documentation: Get the players of a club including retired ones

operation.name: getplayerssportaldeid
operation.documentation: Get the Sportal.de ID of a player

operation.name: getplayerbysportaldeid
operation.documentation: Get the ID of a player by providing the sportal.de ID

operation.name: getplayersspoxid
operation.documentation: Get the spox.com ID of a player

operation.name: getplayerbyspoxid
operation.documentation: Get the ID of a player by providing the spox.com ID

operation.name: getplayersbyuserid
operation.documentation: Get the players of a user

operation.name: getplayersinfobyuserid
operation.documentation: Get the players with purchase info of a user (Only registered and activated IPs for this function)

operation.name: getpartnerranking
operation.documentation: Get a ranking of all users registered through this partner. (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getlastpartnerranking
operation.documentation: Get a ranking of all users registered through this partner for the last gameday. (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getserviceranking
operation.documentation: Get a ranking of all users registered for this service. (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: signupservice
operation.documentation: Signup a user for this web service, returns true on success. (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getserviceexpirationdate
operation.documentation: Get the expiration date of this web service for a user, returns date on success. (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getregisteredusers
operation.documentation: get registered users for your service, returns userids on success. Will return all userids, beware for some userids the service might have expired. You can test the expiration date with getserviceexpirationdate. (Only registered clients)

operation.name: postcommunitynews
operation.documentation: post news message visible for every community member (only registered IPs)

operation.name: player_postcommunitynews
operation.documentation: post news message visible for every community member (only registered PRO-Player)

operation.name: postusernews
operation.documentation: post news message visible only for this user (only registered IPs)

operation.name: player_postusernews
operation.documentation: post news message visible only for this user (only registered PRO-Player)

operation.name: postmultiusernews
operation.documentation: post one news message to many users (visible only for the user) return array of failed userids (only registered IPs)

operation.name: player_postmultiusernews
operation.documentation: post one news message to many users (visible only for the user) return array of failed userids (only registered PRO-Player)

operation.name: postadminnews
operation.documentation: post one news message to all users of one type (only registered IPs)

operation.name: getcurrentbudget
operation.documentation: Read the current budget of a user (registered IPs only)

operation.name: setuserbonus
operation.documentation: Impose a bonus or a fine for a user (registered IPs only)

operation.name: player_setuserbonus
operation.documentation: Impose a bonus or a fine for a user (only registered PRO-Player)

operation.name: getcommunitybonus
operation.documentation: Get total bonus of a community since season started.

operation.name: getuserbonus
operation.documentation: Get bonus of a single user since season started

operation.name: getuserpenalty
operation.documentation: Get penalty of a single user since season started

operation.name: setusertitle
operation.documentation: Set title for a single user (registered IPs only)

operation.name: player_setusertitle
operation.documentation: Set title for a single user (only registered PRO-Player)

operation.name: deleteusertitle
operation.documentation: Deletet title for a single user (registered IPs only)

operation.name: player_deleteusertitle
operation.documentation: Deletet title for a single user (only registered PRO-Player)

operation.name: deleteteamtitle
operation.documentation: Deletet title for whole community (registered IPs only)

operation.name: player_deleteteamtitle
operation.documentation: Deletet title for whole community (only registered PRO-Player)

operation.name: getusertitle
operation.documentation: get titles for a single user (registered IPs only)

operation.name: player_getusertitle
operation.documentation: get titles for a single user (only registered PRO-Player)

operation.name: cancelservice
operation.documentation: Cancel a user for this web service, returns true on success. (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getuserspublictransfers
operation.documentation: Get user Transfers since last gameday if transaction values are public

operation.name: getusertransfers
operation.documentation: Get a user's transfers since last gameday (registered IPs only)

operation.name: getplayersbought
operation.documentation: Get players bought by a user since the specified gameday. May be incomplete. (registered IPs only)

operation.name: getplayerssold
operation.documentation: Get players sold by a user since the specified gameday. May be incomplete. (registered IPs only)

operation.name: getuserscurrentlineup
operation.documentation: Get current users lineup

operation.name: getuserslineupbygameday
operation.documentation: Get the users lineup on gameyday

operation.name: getuserslineupbygamedayid
operation.documentation: Get the users lineup on gameyday by gamday_id

operation.name: getusersplayerbygameday
operation.documentation: Get the users lineup on gameyday

operation.name: getusersplayerbygamedayid
operation.documentation: Get the users lineup on gameyday by gamday_id

operation.name: getmultiusersplayerbygameday
operation.documentation: Get the users lineup on gameyday

operation.name: getmultiusersplayerbygamedayid
operation.documentation: Get the users lineup on gameyday by gamday_id

operation.name: getalluserscurrentlineup
operation.documentation: Get current users lineup (Only registered IPs and activated IPs for this function)

operation.name: getalluserslineupbygameday
operation.documentation: Get the users lineup on gameyday (Only registered IPs and activated IPs for this function)

operation.name: getplayergamedaypoints
operation.documentation: Get the player points by gameday (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getplayergamedaystatistics
operation.documentation: Get the player statistics by gameday (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getplayergamedaystatisticsid
operation.documentation: Get the player statistics by gameday_id (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getquote
operation.documentation: Gets the player's quote, optionally by date. (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getuseridsbyplayer
operation.documentation: Get the users registered for this service with have the player in their squad (Only registered IPs)

operation.name: getwatchlistsbyplayer
operation.documentation: Get the users registered for this service with this player on there watchlist (Only registered IPs and activated IPs for this function)

operation.name: getbestlineupbygameday
operation.documentation: Get the best lineup for a given gameday
